name: ResolutionMediaNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Get expert interpretation of the news and events that are shaping the digital marketing world from Resolution Media, a global digital marketing company. Just ask the Skill for your weekly briefing on digital media news or hear our analysis and points-of-view on industry topics, which can be easily sent to you for full reading as well.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
